title: Formal testacy proceedings; partial intestacy
context: ยง560:3-411 Formal testacy proceedings; partial intestacy. If it becomes evident in the course of a formal testacy proceeding that, though one or more instruments are entitled to be probated, the decedent&rsquo;s estate is or may be partially intestate, the court shall enter an order to that effect. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
